title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological tests.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Parasite
description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: Gladiator
description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated cannibal killer to catch another serial killer who skins his victims.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
description: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man and must help others with the same powers from different dimensions to stop a threat to all realities.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: The Lion King
description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

title: Jurassic Park
description: A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids when a power breakdown allows the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

title: Back to the Future
description: A teenager is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his friend, a mad scientist.

title: Jaws
description: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community, the police chief has only one choice - to hunt it down.

title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
description: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

title: The Sixth Sense
description: A frightened, withdrawn Philadelphia boy who communicates with ghosts seeks help from a dispassionate child psychologist.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team to save the world from an alien attack.

title: Dune
description: Paul Atreides, a brilliant young man, must travel to the dangerous planet Arrakis to ensure the future of his family and people.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
description: Eight years after taking the fall for the crimes of Harvey Dent, Batman braces himself for onslaught from an imposing terrorist called Bane.

title: Inception: Alternative Cut
description: An extended exploration of dreams within dreams with new footage and alternate endings.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

title: Fury
description: A group of American soldiers fight their way through Nazi-occupied Germany.

title: The Great Gatsby
description: A poor man enters high society to impress the love of his life with newfound wealth.

title: Frozen
description: Two sisters must work together to end eternal winter and save their kingdom.

title: Inception 2
description: A continuation of the dream-sharing story with new stakes and deeper mysteries to unravel.

title: Oppenheimer
description: The story of American scientist J. Robert Oppenheimer and the Manhattan Project.

title: Barbie
description: Barbie and Ken navigate the real world in this vibrant, playful adventure.

title: Killers of the Flower Moon
description: An investigation into murders targeting the Osage Nation in 1920s Oklahoma.

title: Godzilla x Kong
description: Two titans clash in an epic battle that could change the world forever.

title: Dune: Part Two
description: Paul Atreides continues his journey on Arrakis as revolution brews.

title: Inside Out 2
description: Emotions return for a new adventure through the mind of a teenager.

title: Deadpool & Wolverine
description: The merc with a mouth teams up with the world's greatest superhero for mayhem.

title: A Quiet Place: Day One
description: A prequel exploring the first day of the invasion that silenced the world.

title: Alien: Romulus
description: A salvage crew encounters deadly creatures on an abandoned spacecraft.

title: Joker: Folie Ã  Deux
description: Arthur Fleck meets another troubled soul in this dark musical drama.
